update t_prd_plan_definition
PLAN_DEF_ID = #{planDefId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PLAN_TYPE = #{planType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLAN_CATEGORY = #{planCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLAN_CODE = #{planCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLAN_VERSION = #{planVersion,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PLAN_NAME = #{planName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLAN_EFFECTIVE_DATE = #{planEffectiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PLAN_EXPIRY_DATE = #{planExpiryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PLAN_DESCRIPTION = #{planDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PLAN_NAME_EN = #{planNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EFFECT_FLAG = #{effectFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLAN_STATUS = #{planStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBMIT_BY = #{submitBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVE_BY = #{approveBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_SUSPEND = #{isSuspend,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IF_UNIFY_ISSUE_PLAN = #{ifUnifyIssuePlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

POLICY_ID = #{policyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEQUENCE_NUMBER = #{sequenceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_OBJECT_ID = #{businessObjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
